summary:
GirlsDoPorn was a U.S. porn website active from 2009 to 2020. In 2019, six people were charged with sex trafficking. The site was removed in 2020 after victims won a civil case. The company made over $17 million. Videos were watched millions of times on various sites.

Women were tricked into making porn with false modeling ads. They were promised money but often not paid, and some were assaulted. The company lied about where the videos would be shown. Victims suffered serious consequences, like losing jobs and thinking about suicide. The owners and others were sentenced to prison.
title: GirlsDoPorn
